config.oreminer.title: OreMiner Config
config.oreminer.maxBlocks.tooltip: Maximum number of ore blocks to break at once
config.oreminer.searchDiagonal.tooltip: Search diagonally (26 directions) instead of just adjacent (6 directions)
config.oreminer.autoCollect.tooltip: Automatically collect dropped items to inventory
config.oreminer.outlineColor.tooltip: Color of the block highlight outline
config.oreminer.showBlocksMinedCount.too: Display the number of blocks mined after breaking
config.oreminer.showBlocksPreview.toolti: Display the number of blocks that will be mined before breaking
config.oreminer.outlineThickness.tooltip: Thickness of the block highlight outline (1.0 - 5.0)
